info.description:
=======================
xhostplus.picturefolder
=======================

A product for Plone 3 and 4 which implements a folder content type with an
optional image field. The image is shown as thumbnail in the folder_summary_view
of the parent folder. The picture folder itself supports all views available
for regular folders.

Translations
============

This product comes with following languages:

* English
* German

Further translations are welcome.

- Questions and comments to support@xhostplus.at

1.0 - 2012-08-06
----------------

- Initial version of xhostplus.picturefolder
  [andreas_stocker]
info.keywords: Picture Image Folder Plugin Product Plone XHOSTPLUS
